items.summary: Daily Values are the basis for FOP thresholds.
items.source_text: The thresholds for the FOP nutrition symbol are based on Daily Values (DVs).

items.summary: The DVs are found in the Table of Daily Values.
items.source_text: The DVs are found in the Table of Daily Values, which is incorporated by reference into the FDR and available on the Government of Canada website.

items.summary: Full exemptions mean no assessment against thresholds is required.
items.source_text: Full exemption means that a symbol is not required even if the product's saturated fat, sugars and/or sodium content meets or exceeds the applicable threshold.

items.summary: Conditional exemptions require assessment against thresholds under specific conditions.
items.source_text: The conditional exemption is based on their conditional exemption from the NFt requirement and for other products it is nutrient-specific based on their ingredients.
